FuncDef: The control word command provides the option to add a control word as part of the packet encapsulation for pseudowire types for which the control word is optional. These are Ethernet pseudowires (Epipe). For the 7750 SR only, ATM N:1 cell mode pseudowires (apipe vc-types atm-vcc and atm-vpc) and VT pseudowire (apipe vc-type atm-cell).
